subject: NCAA Basketball Championships (Women)
Alzheimer's Disease
Basketball (College)
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: Pat Summitt, the Tennessee women’s basketball coach who has said she is in the early stages of Alzheimer’s disease, increasingly relies on her longtime assistants.
snippet: Pat Summitt, the Tennessee women’s basketball coach who has said she is in the early stages of Alzheimer’s disease, increasingly relies on her longtime assistants.
